mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, er_num, em_id, er_pass, er_kind, er_itemnum, er_itemname, er_sub, er_cont, er_hit, er_file, er_original, er_date from (select * from ea_reply order by er_date desc)) where rnum between 1 and 4

select * from (select rownum rnum, eb_itemnum, eb_boardnum, em_id, eb_state, eb_itemname, eb_cont, eb_drprice, eb_stprice, eb_laprice, eb_madein, ey_categorynum, eb_bidcount, eb_attcount, eb_file, eb_original, eb_hit, eb_audate, eb_stdate, eb_saledate, eb_ladate, eb_choicedate from (select * from ea_board where substr(eb_itemnum, 1, 2) = 'SP' and substr(eb_audate, 1, 10) = substr(sysdate, 1, 10) and (eb_state = '금일오픈' or eb_state = '오픈') order by eb_audate))

select * from (select rownum rnum, eb_itemnum, eb_boardnum, em_id, eb_kind, eb_state, eb_itemname, eb_cont, eb_drprice, eb_stprice, eb_laprice, eb_madein, ey_categorynum, eb_bidcount, eb_attcount, eb_file, eb_original, eb_hit, eb_audate, eb_stdate, eb_saledate, eb_ladate, eb_choicedate from (select * from ea_board where eb_kind = '일반' order by eb_ladate desc)) where rnum between 1 and 4

select * from (select rownum rnum, eb_itemnum, eb_boardnum, em_id, eb_kind, eb_state, eb_itemname, eb_cont, eb_drprice, eb_stprice, eb_laprice, eb_madein, ey_categorynum, eb_bidcount, eb_attcount, eb_file, eb_original, eb_hit, eb_audate, eb_stdate, eb_saledate, eb_ladate, eb_choicedate from (select * from ea_board where eb_kind = '일반' order by eb_bidcount desc)) where rnum between 1 and 4
select * from ea_member order by em_date desc
select month, count(month) as count from (select substr(em_date, 4, 2) as month from ea_member) group by month order by month
select month, count(month) as count from (select substr(eb_stdate, 4, 2) as month from ea_board where substr(eb_itemnum, 1, 2) = #{itemnum}) group by month order by month

select category, count(num) as count from (select ea_category.ey_bigcategory as category, ea_board.ey_categorynum as num from ea_board full outer join ea_category on ea_board.ey_categorynum = ea_category.ey_categorynum where substr(eb_itemnum, 1, 2) = #{itemnum}) group by category order by category
select * from ea_point where eg_id = #{eg_id} and eg_state = '대기'
select count(*) from ea_point where eg_id = #{eg_id} and eg_state = '대기'
mapper.update: update ea_point set eg_state = '완료', eg_date = sysdate where eg_num = #{eg_num} and eg_id = #{eg_id}
update ea_member set em_point = em_point + #{eg_recoin} where em_id = #{eg_id}
update ea_member set em_point = em_point - #{eg_recoin} where em_id = #{eg_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ea_plist where ep_user = #{ep_user} and ep_result = '취소대기'
select * from ea_cancel c full outer join ea_plist p on c.eb_itemnum = p.eb_itemnum where p.ep_user = #{ep_user} and p.ep_result = '취소대기'
mapper.update: update ea_board set eb_audate = TO_DATE(#{eb_stdate}, 'RR-MM-DDHH24:MI:SS') + 1, eb_ladate = TO_DATE(#{eb_stdate}, 'RR-MM-DDHH24:MI:SS') + 7 where eb_itemnum = #{eb_itemnum}
